attributes.action: feature the animated character 'El Nombre' in all GCSE maths lessons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to feature the animated mexican gerbil 'El Nombre' from the BBC series 'Numbertime' to feature in all GCSE maths lessons either through video or costume. Obviously, the material would need to be updated to fit the National Curriculum. We think this is a good idea as we think it would improve how well the pupils learn and also mke maths lessons fun.

rejection.details: Pls contact the Dept. For Children Families and Schools with your idea.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
